event-management.publication.confirmatio: Proposals confirmed or declined by speakers.
You need to publish results for accepted proposals.
To get speaker confirmation, organizers must publish results for accepted proposals.
event-management.publication.deliberatio: Proposals accepted or rejected by organizers
You need to mark proposals as accepted or rejected.
To deliberate, open the proposals page, select and mark proposals as accepted or rejected. You can also change the deliberation status individually on a proposal page.
event-management.publication.publish.des: Announce results and send emails to speakers for accepted or rejected proposals.
event-management.publication.publish.mod: The email will be sent to each proposal speaker

team.settings.danger.delete-team.descrip: This will <0>permanently delete the "{{team}}"</0> team, events, speakers proposals, reviews, comments, schedule, and settings. This action cannot be undone.
team.settings.danger.delete-team.heading: Delete this team

team.settings.danger.description: If you leave the team, you’ll lose access to it and won’t be able to manage its events.
